title: After waiting for the ban to start a game .Stuck at 30:44
body:
Pls fix this!!!
Me and my friends wanted to play a game but I had a ban. So we waited for the ban to start the game.
it got stuck at 30:44.

replies.body: They, we saw a few reports of this, but everything should be okay now.  Let me know if it's still an issue!
